criteria: Variety and Diversity of Snack Choices
descriptions: The student is unable to identify any healthy snacks.
The student can identify only one snack, but it may not be a healthy option.
The student can identify one or two healthy snacks, but the choices are limited and may not demonstrate a clear understanding of what constitutes a healthy snack.
The student identifies three or four healthy snacks, showing some understanding of nutritional value.
The student identifies five or more healthy snacks and provides a basic explanation of why these snacks are healthy.

The student accurately identifies a wide variety of healthy snacks, provides detailed explanations of their nutritional benefits, and demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of healthy eating choices.
The student does not provide any variety in snack choices.
The student suggests only one type of snack (e.g., only fruits) with no diversity.
The student provides a limited variety of snacks, with minimal diversity in food groups or nutritional content.
The student suggests snacks from a few different food groups, showing some awareness of a balanced diet.
The student includes snacks from various food groups, demonstrating an understanding of the importance of a balanced and diverse diet.
The student suggests a wide range of snacks from diverse food groups, highlighting the importance of variety for optimal health and nutrition.
The student provides no justification for their snack choices.
The student attempts to justify their snack choices but provides inaccurate or irrelevant information.
The student offers weak or superficial justifications for their snack choices.
The student provides reasonable justifications for their snack choices, referencing basic nutritional benefits.
The student provides clear and accurate justifications for their snack choices, explaining the nutritional benefits and health impacts of each snack.

The student provides insightful and comprehensive justifications for their snack choices, demonstrating a deep understanding of nutrition and the role of healthy snacks in maintaining overall well-being.
